title: LFP - Plat 3+kda and skype
body:
I've been playing ranked for a while, having briefly played in Diamond elo. I quit for several months and am determined to reach diamond before the end of the season. I play all roles quite well and am looking for someone who can generally carry games single handedly, similar to myself. Pm in-game pref
ign:JDW

replies.body: R3demption - Plat 3 S3 , Inactive S4, Occasional S5 Gold 1 atm, Just bored mainly playing around with friends in normals and arams, not playing ranked unless its serious 5's team play. or with a decent duo, exceptional support player but can play ADC aswell, Average top and mid, decent jungle. pref supp. Most of my friends are Masters + Challengers, Couple diamonds and a few plats and i generally play with them daily. So decision making and plays are my forte'
